casebody.data:
Dwayne WIGFALL, Plaintiff-Appellant,
v.
CITY OF DETROIT, Defendant-Appellee. SC: 156793
COA: 333448 Supreme Court of Michigan. January 16, 2019

Order

On order of the Chief Justice, the motion of the Michigan County Road Commission Self-Insurance Pool to extend the time for filing a brief amicus curiae is GRANTED. The amicus brief will be accepted as timely filed if submitted on or before January 31, 2019.
